summary: AN ORDINANCE providing for the laying off, opening, widening and establishing of 35th Avenue Northeast, \*\*\* of Erickson Place Northeast, \*\*\* of Northeast 95th Street, \*\*\* of Northeast 125th Street, \*\*\* all at existing center line grade; providing for the condemnation \*\*\* of land and other property necessary therefor; providing for \*\*\* slopes; \*\*\* providing for the condemnation \*\*\* of land \*\*\* for storm drainage purposes; providing for \*\*\* temporary construction easements; and providing for payment therefor.
